si.title: கண்ணீர் புகையால் நாளைக்கும் சுகயீனம்
body_lines: ශ්රී ලංකා ගුරු සංගමයේ උප සභාපති ඒ.බී.
ගුරුවරුන්ගේ වැටුප් පරස්පරතාවයට චාන්සලර් විසඳුමක් නොව, තමාට අවශ්ය දේ අසන චාන්සලර් හෙට (27) සිදු කරනු ලබන අතර ගුරුවරුන්ගේ ප්රජාතන්ත්රවාදී අරගලය, ජලය හා කඳුළු භාවිතය හෙද වේ කඳුළු සලන දුම් හා කඳුළු.
විදුහල්පතිවරුන් හා ගුරුවරුන්ගේ මර්දනය හෙළා දකින ලෙස ඔහු අද සහාය ඉල්ලා සිටී.

en.title: Tear smoke tomorrow
body_lines: Vice President of the Sri Lanka Teachers Association, A. Deepan Dilean, said that the Chancellor, the teachers and the teachers will launch a sick struggle on Thursday (27), condemning the repression of the Ranil-Rajapakse government on principals and teachers.

The Chancellor does not provide a solution to the salary contradiction to the teachers, but the chancellor, who asks what he wants, will be carried out tomorrow (27), condemning the democratic struggle of the teachers, the use of water and tears, and the tearful smokes and tears.
He has called for support today to condemn the repression of principals and teachers.

summary_lines: Teachers in Sri Lanka, led by the Vice President of the Sri Lanka Teachers Association, plan a protest against government repression, highlighting unresolved salary issues and calling for support.
